'''''ausa''''' (or ''auþa'') is a [[Quenya]] word meaning "a dim shape, [[Spectres|spectral]] or vague apparition".<ref name=VT42>{{VT|42a}}, pp. 9-10</ref>

==Etymology==

*[[Elvish]] ([[Primitive Quendian]] or [[Common Eldarin]]) ''aw'tha'' (from [[Sundocarme|root]] [[WATH]])<ref name=VT42/>

==Cognates==

*[[Sindarin]] ''[[auth]]''
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[gwath]]''

==See also==
*[[Spectres]]
